#include <iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	  char arr[101],arr1[101];
	  gets(arr);
	  int j=0;
	  for(int i=0;i<strlen(arr);i++)
	  {
	  	   
	  	  if(arr[i]=='a'||arr[i]=='e'||arr[i]=='i'||arr[i]=='o'||arr[i]=='u')
	  	  {
	  	  	  i+=2;
	  	  }
	  	  cout<<arr[i];
	  }
	  
	 
	return 0;
}
